page.title: 08RHONDDA COLLEGE OF F.E.
page.content: The College was founded in 1912 and became the Rhondda College of Further Education in 1955. Amenities include Sporting Facilities, Computer Fac- ilities etc. most of which are avail- able for hire to the community. {FUNCTIONS} Preparing a skilled workforce for Eng- ineering and Mining Construction and Commerce and Business Studies areas. Providing a broad training and educ- ation programme for young of Rhondda whether employed or not. Youth Train- ing Scheme launched Sept.1983. Work Skills Courses for unemployed to include both college study plus work experience. Non-vocational(leisure) classes for adults during evenings to develop personal interests and hobbies. {
